Module com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket
Package com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket

Interface ContainerListener

public interface ContainerListener
Listens for container events.

Containers are notified of descendant events if relevant (e.g. a parent is blocked waiting on a child). The listener is invoked while holding a lock, so special care must be taken to avoid deadlocks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    beforeSleep(Container container, long tokens, Instant requestedAt, Instant availableAt, List<Limit> bottlenecks)
    Invoked before sleeping to wait for more tokens.

  • Method Details

    • beforeSleep

      default void beforeSleep(Container container, long tokens, Instant requestedAt, Instant availableAt, List<Limit> bottlenecks) throws InterruptedException
      Invoked before sleeping to wait for more tokens.
      Parameters:
      container - the container the thread is waiting on
      tokens - the number of tokens that the thread is waiting for
      requestedAt - the time at which the tokens were requested
      availableAt - the time at which the requested tokens are expected to become available
      bottlenecks - the list of Limits that are preventing tokens from being consumed
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the operation should be interrupted
